job.name: UPCDst2PairDst
job.command: starver dev echo "Environment setup complete" ln -s "$FILELIST" input.lis echo "Symbolic link created" ls echo "Listing directory contents" root4star -b -q -l "/star/u/corey90/star/UPCDst2PairDst/runPairDst.C(\"input.lis\", \"output.root\")" echo "ROOT macro executed" mv output.root output_PairDst_${JOBID}.root echo "Output file moved"
